member_organisations: we do not have member organizations. We have working partners in Brussels - Regulatory Assistance Project.
eu_initiatives: Clean Energy for all Europeans, Energy Union, new electricity market design, decarbonization, capacity markets, regional energy cooperation, power market transformation, electricity market, renewables.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The Forum for Energy is a think tank, focused on forging the foundation for a clean, innovative, safe and efficient energy sector based on data and analysis. It is a fact-based, professional, trustworthy partner for dialog and a knowledge hub for the energy sector in Poland and in the region.
